name: iteraresearch
mainTitle: 52 appointments in 4 months and a chock-full pipeline for Blochain company
description: Zfort is a distinguished software development company with a passion for solving complex business challenges. With a focus on innovation and cutting-edge technology, Zfort sought to enhance their lead generation and sales strategies to drive business growth.
challengeDescription: Zfort Group faced specific challenges in their lead generation and sales efforts, which required a strategic approach to overcome:

challengeList.title: Inconsistent Lead Generation:
challengeList.description: Zfort was facing issues with the consistency of lead generation, leading to fluctuations in their sales pipeline.

challengeList.title: Title research:
challengeList.description: Conversion Rate Concerns: Maintaining a satisfactory conversion rate from leads to customers was proving to be a challenge.

challengeList.title: Sales Team Alignment:
challengeList.description: Zfort needed to align their sales team with changing market dynamics and effectively communicate their unique value proposition.

solutionDescription: To address the challenges faced by Zfort Group, LeadWise implemented strategic solutions to revamp their lead generation and sales processes:

solutionList.title: Data-Driven Lead Generation:
solutionList.description: LeadWise implemented a data-driven approach, leveraging industry-specific insights to identify potential clients and engage them effectively.

solutionList.title: Streamlined Sales Process:
solutionList.description: LeadWise introduced a streamlined sales process to ensure that all leads were nurtured effectively and provided with the information they needed.

solutionList.title: Targeted Outreach:
solutionList.description: By creating personalized and industry-specific outreach campaigns, LeadWise maximized Zfort's reach and appeal to potential clients.

implementationList.description: Conducted in-depth market research to identify target industries and key decision-makers.
Crafted customized email and content marketing campaigns tailored to Zfort's unique value proposition.
Introduced lead nurturing strategies to guide prospects through the sales funnel, providing them with the necessary information and support.

resultDescription: The collaboration with LeadWise led to remarkable results for Zfort Group:

resultDescriptionList.description: Consistent Lead Generation: The data-driven approach provided Zfort Group with a steady flow of leads, ensuring a more predictable sales pipeline.
Improved Conversion Rates: The streamlined sales process and targeted outreach campaigns resulted in a significant increase in conversion rates.
Enhanced Sales Team Alignment: The guidance and training provided by LeadWise empowered Zfort Group's sales team to effectively communicate the company's unique value proposition.

resultsEnding: These results effectively addressed the identified challenges and positioned Zfort Group for continued growth and success in their software development endeavors.

name: cowchain
mainTitle: ABM strategy for a Blockchain company that brought 35+ appointments and 144% KPI
description: Cowchain is a forward-thinking Software and Blockchain Development company dedicated to providing innovative solutions that address real business challenges. With a strong commitment to technology and blockchain, Cowchain distinguishes itself not only through what it creates but also through how it innovates. Their services encompass a wide range of solutions, including asset marketplaces, decentralized exchanges, inventory management systems, coins management, and custom user profiles with unique fitness track records. Cowchain prides itself on exceeding client expectations, going beyond conventional software development practices.
challengeDescription: Cowchain faced specific challenges in their lead generation and sales efforts, requiring a strategic approach to overcome:

challengeList.title: Need for growth.
challengeList.description: The client’s No. 1 challenge was promoting their portable router, GO, to new markets since they had little experience in expansion.

challengeList.title: Limited in-house resources.
challengeList.description: The client didn’t have a lead prospecting strategy that would cover all titles interested in the product. As most OTH customers came from referrals, the sales team hadn’t yet developed a specific ideal customer profile (ICP) that could be worked out into several customer personas and result in an effective title research.

challengeList.title: Covering new acquisition channels.
challengeList.description: They covered multiple acquisition channels like referral and events but wanted to go outbound. This is why the client started looking for agencies to outsource their lead generation. They chose LeadWise after receiving a lead sample: Our leads were within scope, and our onboarding process and campaign timelines were transparent and clear.

solutionDescription: To address these challenges, LeadWise implemented strategic solutions to revamp Cowchain's lead generation and sales processes:

solutionList.title: Data-Driven Lead Generation.
solutionList.description: LeadWise introduced a data-driven approach, utilizing industry-specific insights to ensure a consistent flow of leads and a more predictable sales pipeline for Cowchain.

solutionList.title: Streamlined Sales Process and Targeted Outreach.
solutionList.description: LeadWise optimized Cowchain's sales process by conducting comprehensive research to identify and target key decision-makers. Additionally, personalized outreach campaigns were designed and executed to nurture leads, ensuring prospects received the necessary information for informed decision-making.

implementationDescription: To implement these solutions, LeadWise executed a series of strategic steps:

implementationList.description: Conducted in-depth market research to identify target industries and key decision-makers.
Crafted customized email and content marketing campaigns to engage and inform potential clients effectively.
Introduced lead nurturing strategies to guide prospects seamlessly through the sales funnel.

resultDescription: The collaboration with LeadWise led to remarkable results for Cowchain:

resultDescriptionList.description: 97 booked appointments in 10 months, 56 of which were marked as either a very good or a perfect fit by the client.
10 booked appointments from 200 leads within one of the event campaigns.
20 highly tailored cold outreach campaigns launched.
Up to 65% open rate reached, with an average above 60%.
Highest reply rate of 14%, twice higher than the industry average.
Average KPI of 137% over 6 months, reaching 144% in the last quarter.

name: freshtech
mainTitle: 20+ appointments and 120% KPIs: How LeadWise helped FreshTech expand and grow
description: FreshTech stands at the forefront of innovative IT solutions, providing a holistic approach to meet the evolving demands of contemporary businesses. Our vision is centered on simplifying work, business, and life through cutting-edge technologies. FreshTech offers a comprehensive suite of solutions designed to bring a fresh perspective to IT challenges, empowering individuals and businesses alike.
challengeDescription: FreshTech faced a series of challenges when it came to generating leads and growing its user base:

challengeList.title: Unsuccessful Previous Partnership.
challengeList.description: While FreshTech had a revolutionary HR platform, they needed a reliable method to attract potential users and convert them into leads.

challengeList.title: Establishing Market Presence.
challengeList.description: In a competitive HR technology landscape, FreshTech struggled to differentiate itself and establish a strong presence.

challengeList.title: Scalability.
challengeList.description: With aspirations to scale their user base, FreshTech needed a sustainable lead generation strategy to fuel their growth.

solutionDescription: LeadWise stepped in to help FreshTech address these challenges through tailored solutions:

solutionList.title: Targeted Lead Generation Campaigns.
solutionList.description: LeadWise developed targeted lead generation campaigns to attract potential users who would benefit from FreshTech's HR platform.

solutionList.title: Differentiation Strategy.
solutionList.description: A differentiation strategy was implemented to highlight FreshTech's unique features and value proposition, setting them apart in the competitive market.

solutionList.title: Scalable Lead Acquisition.
solutionList.description: LeadWise designed a scalable lead acquisition plan to ensure consistent growth over time, aligning with FreshTech's expansion goals.

implementationDescription: The successful implementation of these solutions involved:

implementationList.description: To capture the interest of HR professionals and businesses seeking a comprehensive HR solution.
That emphasized the unique advantages of FreshTech.
That accommodated the need for scalability, ensuring sustained growth.

resultDescription: The collaboration between LeadWise and FreshTech led to impressive outcomes:

resultDescriptionList.description: Robust Lead Pipeline: LeadWise's targeted campaigns delivered a steady flow of qualified leads, allowing FreshTech to grow its user base.
Market Distinction: FreshTech successfully carved out a niche in the competitive HR technology market by highlighting their unique features and benefits.
Sustained Growth: The scalable lead acquisition strategy ensured FreshTech long-term growth ambitions were met.

name: one-click-code
mainTitle: 100% KPI performance for a Roofing Application and 25+ appointments in 3 month
description: OneClick Code is a revolutionary application that provides quick and accurate access to address-specific roofing codes, facilitating code compliance for construction professionals.
challengeDescription: OneClick Code faced several challenges in terms of expanding its user base and promoting its unique offering:

challengeList.title: Negative experience collaborating with another lead generation company.
challengeList.description: Within a year of cooperation with an outsourced team, OCC Marketing Group dealt with unqualified leads, which resulted in zero booked appointments. The main reason for that was a misunderstanding of the client’s business specifics and needs.

challengeList.title: A need for a consistent flow of qualified leads.
challengeList.description: TA client required not only validated leads but their nonstop flow on a regular basis.

challengeList.title: Need for multiple leads in a narrow niche

solutionList.title: Implementation of the local outreach campaign.
solutionList.description: We launched a face-to-face outreach campaign to target only local businesses based in Colorado in a limited range of industries. The main concept of the cold outreach was to target companies in the internal market, aiming to facilitate the growth of local businesses.

solutionList.title: Leads segmenting according to specific industry and applying a F2F approach.
solutionList.description: According to the client’s requests, we applied only a F2F approach to foster deal closing. Our email writers crafted highly personalized templates targeting particular industries and incorporated social proofs and the company’s achievements that addressed specific prospects’ pain points.

solutionList.title: Management and support of real-time meetings with prospects.
solutionList.description: Since the F2F approach requires intensive communication with the client and the prospect, we facilitated this process with our active engagement and support at each step of the journey.

resultDescription: The collaboration with LeadWise led to remarkable results for OCC:

resultDescriptionList.description: We set up approximately 10 appointments each month, which resulted in 24+ F2F meetings in 3 months in total.
So far, the total number of deals closed is 5.
The highest open rate reached 54%, while the reply rate was 6–7%.
The client’s active involvement in in-person meetings with prospects and LeadWise handcrafted approach toward lead qualification ensured an approximate 20% of the closed rate.
